description:
Fairy Bottles are a returning staple of the Legend of Zelda series, but they work a bit differently in Echoes of Wisdom. In this video, we’ll show you where to find all four Fairy Bottles, and even show you where to find the Great Fairy Fountain to fill them up quickly!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom - All Fairy Bottle Locations (Great Fairy Location)

description:
Check out this new trailer for DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO, available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series Consoles, and PC!

Presented by DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO
title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO - Ignite the Spark Official Trailer

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
August's sales numbers are in, and Helldivers 2 has been dethroned as the best-selling game of the year so far, and you'll never guess what game was the top-selling game of August (you can probably guess). In related news, the just-released Metaphor: ReFantazio sold A TON of copies on Day One, which is great news for a brand new IP. And Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero isn't even officially out yet, but is already racking up huge concurrent numbers in Early Access.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Helldivers 2 Unseated as the Best-Selling Game of 2024 - IGN Daily Fix

description:
Money in Metaphor: ReFantazio comes at a premium. There's a lot of expensive things to buy, certain times you should buy them, and the frequent introduction of new archetypes means you'll want to be switching up your equipment constantly. Thankfully, we have an early game method featuring one of the first optional dungeons, one of your social links, and a great spot to grind. Let's get to it.

Timecodes:

00:00 - Intro
00:25 - How to Unlock the Merchant Archetype
01:19 - How To Defeat Belega Corridor Boss (Grotesque Guptauros)
03:46 - What To Do After Unlocking Merchant
05:10 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming
title: Metaphor: ReFantazio - How To Make Money Fast (Early Game)

description:
In Permafrost , exploration, resourcefulness, and crafting are the order of the day as players construct intricate shelters from scrap, cultivate crops to stave off hunger, and harness the power of technology to fend off threats both human and environmental. The sub-zero temperatures will have an effect on character capabilities as they fend for themselves in challenging and life affecting conditions. 

Permafrost is now available for Wishlist on Steam
title: Permafrost - Official Steam Next Fest Trailer

description:
One of the most challenging "What If" branches to uncover in Dragon Ball Sparking! requires you to beat Goku Black Rosé, Zamasu, and then Fused Zamasu extremely quickly in the mission "Into a Third Future" on Goku's Episode Battle. If you're trying to be completionist and find all of the secret path branches, here are some tips on how to beat the fearsome duo fast enough in order to satisfy the secondary win condition.

#IGN #Gaming #DragonBall
title: Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero - How to Beat Zamasu and Goku Black Quickly - Into a Third Future

description:
Get a first look at Trung Trac and her battle-ready abilities!

The award-winning strategy game franchise returns with a revolutionary new chapter. Sid Meier's Civilization VII empowers you to build the greatest empire the world has ever known!
Sid Meier's Civilization VII launches worldwide on February 11th, 2025 for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Civilization 7 - Official First Look: Trung Trac Trailer

description:
Starship Troopers: Extermination combines frenetic squad-based gunplay with base-building and resource extraction against swarms of diverse arachnid foes. Choose from six distinct classes and work together to complete objectives, acquire resources, build and defend your base, and extract critical materials in intense battles to secure the future of the United Citizen Federation. Leave no inch of ground safe for the Arachnid enemy!

Starship Troopers: Extermination is available now on Steam, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, or the Epic Games Store

#IGN #Gaming #StarshipTroopers
title: Starship Troopers: Extermination - Official Launch Trailer

description: Is the Alarmo worth the price? In this clip from Nintendo Voice Chat, Seth Macy gives us his first impressions. For more Alarmo and Nintendo talk, check out IGN's Nintendo Voice Chat podcast on IGN.com and on Youtube.com/IGNGames.
title: Set Your Alarmo it’s NVC O’clock - NVC Clips

description:
Metaphor: ReFantazio is a brand-new fantasy JRPG from the creators of Persona 3, 4, and 5. You’ll travel across a unique world with your companions and take part in the Royal Tournament, seeking support for the throne while you try to lift the curse from the kingdom’s lost prince. There’s lots to do: building friendships, traveling the world, and awakening new powers. Here are the top 5 features of Metaphor: ReFantazio.

Metaphor Refantazio is now available on Xbox, PlayStation and PC.
Presented by Metaphor: ReFantazio
title: Metaphor: ReFantazio: 5 Things You Need to Know
Undisputed is making sure that the game feels authentic to the fighters.Presented by @PlayUndisputed

description:
Playing with your mates, whether on your local pitch or in EA Sports FC, is a core experience for football fans. With Rush, EA Sports FC 25 delivers a 5v5 experience with shorter, streamlined matches to prevent footie fatigue and give you more focus on controlling individual players so that every moment counts, in other words, the ideal way to play with you mates. Sponsored by EA.

#IGN
title: How EA Sports FC 25’s Rush Mode Has Been Designed For Playing With Mates

description:
Introducing Terrifier: The ARTcade Game, the retro-inspired, pixel-art beat-'em-up based on Art the Clown's world from the Terrifier horror movies. In fact, you play as Art in this four-player local co-op brawler with a chiptune soundtrack. Terrifier: The ARTcade game will be released in 2025 for Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Terrifier: The ARTcade Game - Official Reveal Trailer

description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week Daemon is joined by Podcast Beyond's Max Scoville and Unlocked's Ryan McCaffrey to discuss the major shift happening over at Halo devleoper 343 Industries...oops we mean't Halo Studios. And does the franchise's move to Unreal Engine 5 mean a likely PS5 port of any of the existing or future games? Plus we have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com

#IGN #Gaming
title: Why You Should Expect Halo 7 on PS5 - Next-Gen Console Watch

description:
Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered includes Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation (1999), Tomb Raider: Chronicles (2000), and Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness (2003), each remastered with improved visuals that bring new life to environments, characters, and artifacts, with the option to toggle between classic and modern graphics on the fly.
Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered launches on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store on Feb. 14, 2025.
title: Tomb Raider 4 - 6 Remastered - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Check out this Silent Hill 2 Remake movie, featuring all Silent Hill 2 cutscenes as well as key SH2 gameplay moments, scares, and more. Join James Sunderland, Mary, Pyramid Head, and Maria, on a spooky psychological survival horror adventure throughout the nightmarish town of Silent Hill.

Check out this 4K video game playthrough of the 2024 retelling of SH2, which will take you through the Eastern South Vale, Wood Wide Apartments, Bluecreek Apartments, Western South Vale, Brookhaven Hospital, Toluca Prison, the Labyrinth, and of course, the Lakeview Hotel! Bloober Team has crafted a dense, and horrific experience, which you’ll get to experience from the comfort of your own screen!

So sit back, relax and enjoy this Silent Hill 2 movie, of the full game. The Silent Hill 2 remake, by Bloober Team and Konami, is out now on PS5 (PlayStation 5) and PC (Steam).

#SilentHill #SilentHill2 #Gaming
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake Movie - All Cutscenes (4K)

description:
In this unique racing adventure, the AUTOBOTS and DECEPTICONS are on a mission to recover the stolen Prime Relics that grant great power to those who possess them. With five playable AUTOBOTS; Optimus Prime, Bumblebee, Elita-1, Wheeljack and Arcee, five playable DECEPTICONS; Megatron, Shockwave, Flamewar, Soundwave and Nightbird, as well as the ultimate antagonist, Nemesis Prime. Each character is infused with their own personality, bespoke voiceover lines and unlockable skins for customisation, as well as two unique skills each, such as Wheeljack’s Wrecking Bomb, Soundwave’s Sonic Sphere and Nemesis Prime’s Axe of Extinction. With eight unique weapons available to every character, players can expect a varied gameplay experience with every race.
Transformers: Galactic Trials is out now on consoles and PC.
title: Transformers: Galactic Trials - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Boxing fans rejoice! IGN's own Alan Wheeler got a chance to head to Las Vegas to get the ultimate boxing experience, From stopping by Steel City Interactive's office and chatting with Ash Habib about the making of Undisputed, checking out the Canelo vs Berlanga fight with BigCheese, and even going head to head against a boxing legend, Roy Jones Jr!

Presented by Undisputed.
title: Can We Beat a Boxing Legend in Undisputed?

description:
More than just a Persona or Shin Megami Tensei clone, Metaphor: ReFantazio does a lot things differently than its predecessors. Here’s a guide to 17 things we wish we knew sooner about Atlus’s newest RPG. We made this as spoiler free as possible, but to show the full breadth of what Metaphor has to offer, we had to show some later game party members that have already been featured in promotional material. We just wanted to give you a heads up!
Metaphor is an RPG that combines turn-based battles, social sim elements, and a highly political story in a fantasy setting. Characters like Hulkenburg, Strohl, Gallica, and others join you on your journey to be the next king. You fight using Archetypes, which are basically classes– You have the standard like Warrior, Make, and Brawler, but also more subversive ones like Faker, which focuses on debuffing your enemy, and Merchant, which combines powerful passive abilities with a literal weaponization of currency.
This guide will go over things li
title: Metaphor: ReFantazio - 17 Things We Wish We Knew Sooner

description:

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
If you've sensed a great disturbance in the Force, it's probably because the Prequel-era beat-em-up Star Wars: Episode I—Jedi Power Battles is making a return. The hi-res update also includes new unlocked characters and a couch co-op mode. The port is being handled by Aspyr, who has made a ton of old Star Wars games new again, with varying degrees of success (the team is still trying to patch the buggy Star Wars: Battlefront Classic collection from earlier this year). In other news, the upcoming MechWarrior 5: Clans will hit Game Pass on Day 1 next week. And finally, developer Secret Door has revealed their first game: Sunderfolk, which hits Switch, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S next year.
title: Star Wars: Jedi Power Battles Is Back in Time for Its 25th Anniversary - IGN Daily Fix

description:
Vegeta may not yet be a super saiyan, but the fight against Great Ape Vegeta in Goku's Episode battle is by far one of the toughest early fights in Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero, and requires you to go in with a very different strategy than you would against a normal foe. Here's our guide on how to beat Great Ape Vegeta in Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero.

#IGN #Gaming #DragonBall
title: Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero - How to Beat Great Ape Vegeta
